title: [Basalt Flats, Bridge]
description: The trail branches to the east and to the southwest, feebly winding through rough outcrops of volcanic rock.  Moonlight bathes the dark stone with its soft illumination, casting all the crags and pocks in deep shadow.
The trail branches to the east and to the southwest, feebly winding through rough outcrops of volcanic rock.  Tiny flowers bloom in pockets in the boulders, their blooms jaunty in the severe terrain.
